entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few showers ending early this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 70%
